info.name: Tumblr Dash -  Red Charming OUAT
info.description: A Red Charming from Once Upon A Time tumblr dashboard style. I'm new to styling but if the style is affecting more than just tumblr, go to the Stylish icon and click 'edit' under the style, then change "applies to" to 'urls starting with' and add http://www.tumblr.com/
